title: (a) Champtoceaux from the West; (b) The Folies-Siffait and the Château de Clermont from the East; (c) The Tower at Oudon, with Windmills behind Village; (d) Champtoceaux from the River, with the ‘péage’ in the Foreground; (e) View Downriver
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
